name: 2 units, 1 type, balanced hourly
description: Predictable smoke test. Deterministic hourly demand (0h..7h) with mission split 50/50 across VMU-1 and VMU-3. Flight time 1.0h, no other times. Expected (with ≥1 aircraft/pilot/SO per unit): Request=8, Start=8, Complete=8; per-unit completions ≈4; utilization per resource per unit ≈ 1/8 = 12.5%.
questions: Are missions distributed according to mission_split?
Do per-unit completions match expected evenly split throughput?
